name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM SlideShow
summary: A CDSZ file is a slide show created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a Windows and macOS diagramming application. It contains one or more pages of diagrams, drawings, flowcharts, etc., and also stores settings, such as the autoplay interval and whether or not it loops. ConceptDraw DIAGRAM users save diagrams as CDSZ slide shows to present them to an audience.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
